Key Match Events: Son Heung-Min scored a penalty in the 11th minute.
Jung Seung-Hyun scored in the 87th minute.
Match ended with China PR 0, Korea Republic 3.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Match took place at Shenzhen Universiade Sports Centre with an attendance of 39,969.
Referee for the match was Abdulrahman Al-Jassim.
